member.name: CATEGORY_INFO
member.summary: Contains category information. A component category is a group of logically-related Component Object Model (COM) classes that share a common category identifier (CATID).

member.name: CATEGORY_INFO.cif
member.summary: A flag from that specifies the type of information to retrieve.

member.name: CATEGORY_INFO.wszName
member.summary: A character array that specifies the name of the category.
